com.lsct.edp.business

Class PropertyHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lsct.edp.business.PropertyHelper

  • public class PropertyHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provide a list of static methods to help reading values from a property file
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Andrea Boggia, andrea.boggia@gmail.com

    • Method Detail

      • gerPropertyReader

        public static java.util.Properties gerPropertyReader(java.lang.String filename)
                                              throws javax.naming.ConfigurationException
        return the property reader for fiven filename.
        Parameters:
        filename - resource filename. It's assumed that file is locate into the resource file
        Returns:
        the property reader for the given file
        Throws:
        javax.naming.ConfigurationException - in case the file is missing

      • getRequiredProperty

        public static java.lang.String getRequiredProperty(java.util.Properties propReader,
                                                   java.lang.String property)
                                            throws javax.naming.ConfigurationException
        Searches for the property with the specified key in the specified property.
        Parameters:
        propReader - property list
        property - property key
        Returns:
        a string representing property value
        Throws:
        javax.naming.ConfigurationException - in case property key is not found or with empty value

      • getRequiredPropertyAsDouble

        public static double getRequiredPropertyAsDouble(java.util.Properties propReader,
                                                 java.lang.String property)
                                          throws javax.naming.ConfigurationException
        Searches for the property with the specified key in the specified property
        Parameters:
        propReader - property list
        property - property key
        Returns:
        property value as double
        Throws:
        javax.naming.ConfigurationException - in case property key is not found, with empty value or not parsable as double
